data.eml:eml: Pseudaspidimeruspalatus, a new species of the genus Pseudaspidimerus Kapur, 1948 from the Malay Peninsula (Coleoptera, Coccinellidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Huo, Lizhi, Li, Wenjing, Wang, Xingmin (2017): Pseudaspidimeruspalatus, a new species of the genus Pseudaspidimerus Kapur, 1948 from the Malay Peninsula (Coleoptera, Coccinellidae). ZooKeys 706: 109-115, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.706.18081, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.706.18081
